title: The Best Medicine: The Complete Collection
description: What happens when a young nurse and her handsome, eligible bachelor of a boss find themselves crossing the line between professional and very, very personal? Collected for the first time between two covers, follow the entire sizzling Mercy Hospital saga of Brynn and her Chief of Staff, Dr. Sam Hitchens, as they blur the boundaries in HIS BIDDING, break the rules in HER DESIRE, and lose themselves - and maybe more - to their torrid affair in THEIR SECRET. It's the most fun you'll ever have spending time in a hospital...
author: Ella Blythe
